This game is very interesting to me, I found it tough to get invested at first, but learning the game as a survivor and eventually killer was a lot of my motivation to keep playing. This game has a plethora of problems. From the broken lobbies randomly disconnecting, to questionable hitboxes, a community that constantly debates what toxicity is, and it's repetitive gameplay, it's not hard to understand why many would not recommend this game. However I have felt that it is very addicting and I keep coming back, whether in solo survivor queue, with friends, or as killer. The music in the lobby is very atmospheric and honestly a lot of the reason I play, I enjoy messing around with the various perks in the game, and I personally find getting chased and doing generators is very satisfying. The game also gets new survivors and killers on a reasonable basis. While I may change my opinion about this in the future, currently I have found many hours of fun in Dead by Daylight. 7/10

Jogo divertido e cativando, é super engraçado jogar com os amigos e impossível de ficar sem comprar uma DLCzinha kkkkkk, depois das atualizações gráficas de imagem e animações eu parei de ficar caindo da partida a cada 1 hora, isso era algo que me irritava muito e colaborava para não ter uma boa experiência, e também ficou muito mais bem otimizado, prevenindo quedas de frames (que antes eu tinha).

When Steam asks you to post a review about a game, the question given is: "Would you recommend this game to other players?", not "Is this game good?". Dead by Daylight is a good game at its core, but there's no way I would recommend it to anyone.

In Dead by Daylight, a killer races to sacrifice four survivors to a daemonic presence known only as "The Entity" while the survivors scramble desperately to outsmart and evade the killer while they make their escape from the arena.

The core concept of Dead by Daylight: asymmetrical survial horror - is fun, original and fairly well-executed. The game has a tense mood and atmosphere and a lot of originality and character. The perk and addon systems allow you to customise your play style, and greatly increase the tactical depth of the game. You are rewarded for having a broad knowledge of the game's mechanics, and matches are often more a battle of wits than of reflexes. Aside from some very questionable stuff like button-spam mechanics and clumsy animations, the core of the game is solid.

The game can have really intense and exhilarating moments, such as narrowly escaping the arena with the killer in pursuit after rescuing a teammate during the "end-game collapse", or watching your carefully-laid traps cause havoc among a group of survivors.

Now for the bad part: the community. Dead by Daylight has the most toxic community of any game I've ever played. If you play as killer (which you probably will given the long queue times to find a game as a survivor), you will be subjected to abuse in every single game session. Many people can't handle losing, and the post-game chat makes it all too easy for them to let you know that. The exhiliration of playing well and winning will almost always be spoiled by abuse from a disgruntled player.

Players who can't wait for the post-game chat can avail of the terrible matchmaking system to get their angst out instead. You will be frequently matchmade against players far above your rank or using Discord who will delight in using the most obnoxious and frustrating tactics to waste as much time as possible and drag the match on for way longer than it should take (the game mechanics give an overwhelming advantage to survivors communicating using external voice chat tools). Just as often, you will be pitted against players that are clearly far below your rank, leaving a sour taste in your mouth after easily winning the game.

These issues have existed in Dead by Daylight for years, so the devs are clearly either unwilling or incapable of fixing them. It's a shame. Dead by Daylight could be one of the best games on Steam if the community was fixed. But I guess banned players don't buy DLCs.

DBD é um jogo quem curte de vez em quando tomar uns jump scare, se irritar com assassinos novatos (quando esta de sobrevivente) e se deliciar com sobreviventes novatos (quando está de assassino). É um jogo no qual é importante você entender tanto a visão do assassino quanto sobrevivente, assim a gameplay flui e você evolui mais rápido.
Ainda há alguns problemas de bugs, mas são bem poucos. Nada que faça você querer rascar teu @ com um punho.
Enfim, DBD é um bom jogo para se jogar com amigos ou sozinho mesmo (preferencia killers kkkk), para você que está lendo até aqui, te dou um conselho: Este jogo quase sempre entra em promoção, se você quer economizar dinheiro, veja alguns vídeos de gameplay, conheça os assassinos, sobreviventes e perks (atributos que te ajudam na partida), e assim vc consegue comprar o jogo e uma dlc na promoção o que valeria somente o jogo.
Beijunda para você e espero que sobreviva ^^

This game has it ups and downs. It constantly struggles with balancing issues, the community has parts of it that should not see the sun, and a majority of the things in the game are not worth using if you are solely focused on winning. However, these issues do not hinder the game in any way. There are constant balancing changes and new things being added to the game. To be honest, they can't make everyone happy, and they shouldn't have to. If you don't like it all that much or find yourself getting heated, take a break and come back later. This is the game that will always be there for you, and will have fresh content waiting for you to try. I highly recommend this game.

Dead by Daylight is a strange duck. I've had many a fun hour on my own and with friends in it, and yet a small part of me wants to say that it was mismanaged time. In the end however I can't say it's a bad game. A game with problems maybe but the community around the game hasn't helped.

It's first and foremost a game that seems impossible to balance. There's been numerous times over the years where I've felt/seen favour lean towards survivors or killers with regards to some certain perks. Indeed usually when new killers and survivors come out, there is a brief time when balance seems to be totally out the window, however people are still playing it, and I am one of those people.

Much has been added since I first started. We have a lot of cosmetics which I find a waste of money and bloodpoints, we have many new survivors and killers, some rather unique and interesting and others more a forgotten footnote that rarely sees the light of day, and we have the rift and other such extensions of the game that give us things like bloodpoints and free cosmetics for the game. 

At the core though the game isn't about bloodpoints, the currency you earn for killing all survivors/survivors escaping the trial. It's still 4v1 with survivors needing to repair the generators to open the gates and killers needing to stop and murder them. That's really enough for me, and whilst things like balance issues, toxicity in the community and bugs and glitches (less so now than in the dark times thankfully) will always remain an issue, it's not gonna stop me recommending. 7/10.

장점 

1.

단점

1. 너무나도 많은 버그
이 게임에는 말로 다 하면 죽고나서도 할 수 있을 정도로 버그가 넘쳐나는데, 여기 제작자들은 그런 버그를 1도 고칠 생각이 없습니다, 심지어 이 게임 초창기부터 있던 버그가 남아있다는것은 그것을 뒷받침하는 증거죠

2. 고장난 매칭 시스탬
솔직히 이거 고장난거 아니면 그냥 게임 자체가 잘못 만들어진 겁니다, 아니 어떻게 하면 20랭(게임 최저랭크)랑 1랭(게임 최고랭크)을 매칭시켜줄 발상을 하겠어요, 이게 무슨 철권인줄 압니까?? 모르면 맞아야지야?? 만약 진짜 이 생각으로 게임을 만들었다면, 이 게임에 뭐가 잘못된건지 1도 관심이 없고 모른다면 그냥 제작자 너네도 맞아야 되는 게임입니다

3. 망가지다 못해 가루가 된 밸런스
원래 이 게임 공포 생존 멀티 게임이거든요? 근데 지금 여기서 맞는게 멀티밖에 없어요, 공포는 생존자가 아닌 살인마가 느끼고 있고, 생존도 마찬가지로 살인마가 생존해야 하거든요, 지금 다시보니 생존자가 아니라 살인마한태 모든게 몰아져있다고 해야겟네요, 정말 게임을 어떻게 만들면 이정도로 밸런스 문제가 심각해지는지 참 궁금하네요, 이게임에 장르 하나 더 붙혀야겠네요, 잠재적 살인마 제작 시뮬레이터로, 왜냐하면 이 게임을 하면서 이 게임의 제작자를 쳐죽이고 싶어할꺼니까요.

4. 이 모든걸 고칠 생각이 없는 제작자
그냥 답이 없습니다, 네.. 밸런스는 잡으려는 시도가 몇번 보이기는 했으나 무의미하거나 아예 캐릭터를 죽여버리거나 새로운 밸붕캐릭터를 만드는 등 정상적인 대처 방법이 단 하나도 안보였습니다, 물론 제가 과장해서 말한 부분도 있을껍니다, 하지만 대부분은 과장이 아니라 진실이라는게 이 게임의 가장 큰 문제죠, 게임의 밸런스가 안맞다는것은 다양한 캐릭터를 보기 힘들고 틀에 잡힌 게임만 할 수 있다는 것입니다, 이 얼마나 지루하고 엿같은 게임입니까.
